item.title: 22 - Reactive Programming
item.description: In dieser Folge besprechen wir das Thema Unit Testing. Mit dabei sind wie immer Ben, Dom und Vincent. Schreibt uns gerne bei Twitter oder in Slack! Hallo Swift #22 - Reactive Programming History Rx: Reactive Extensions Allgemeine Informationen und Links ‚ÄúGitHub for Windows uses the Reactive Extensions for almost everything it does, including network requests, UI events, managing child processes (git.exe). Using Rx and ReactiveUI, we’ve written a fast, nearly 100% asynchronous, responsive application, while still having 100% deterministic, reliable unit tests.
